title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 118.2 - Filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 118.2 - Filing

State Regulations

The registration statement shall be submitted in duplicate, one of which statements has been certified by the president, a vice-president
or secretary of the bank holding company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
118.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
